gormçš„CRUDæ“ä½œ

å®‰è£…

ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªæ˜¯gormçš„åº“ï¼Œç¬¬äºŒä¸ªæ˜¯mysqlçš„è¿æ¥é©±åŠ¨

è¿æ¥æ•°æ®åº“

GORM å®˜æ–¹æ”¯æŒçš„æ•°æ®åº“ç±»å‹æœ‰ï¼š MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQlite, SQL Server

åˆ›å»ºDBå®ä¾‹

//æ„å»ºè¿æ¥å­—ç¬¦ä¸²
/*æ³¨æ„ï¼šæƒ³è¦æ­£ç¡®çš„å¤„ç† time.Time ï¼Œæ‚¨éœ€è¦å¸¦ä¸Š parseTime å‚æ•°ï¼Œ (æ›´å¤šå‚æ•°)è¦æ”¯æŒå®Œæ•´çš„ UTF-8 ç¼–ç ï¼Œæ‚¨éœ€è¦å°† charset=utf8 æ›´æ”¹ä¸º charset=utf8mb4 æŸ¥çœ‹ æ­¤æ–‡ç«  è·å–è¯¦æƒ…*/
dsn := "root:password1234@tcp(127.0.0.1:3306)/gorm?charset=utf8mb4&parseTime=True&loc=Local"
db, _ = gorm.Open(mysql.Open(dsn), &gorm.Config{})

ç»“æ„ä½“æ˜ å°„æ•°æ®åº“è¡¨

åˆ›å»ºç»“æ„ä½“

package main

import (
	"gorm.io/gorm"
)

type User struct {
	gorm.Model
	Name string
	Age  uint8
}

ä½¿ç”¨db.AutoMigrate(User{})æ–¹æ³•ä»ç»“æ„ä½“ç”Ÿæˆæ•°æ®åº“è¡¨

è¿æ¥è®¾ç½®

sqlDB, _ := db.DB()

// SetMaxIdleConns è®¾ç½®ç©ºé—²è¿æ¥æ± ä¸­è¿æ¥çš„æœ€å¤§æ•°é‡
sqlDB.SetMaxIdleConns(10)

// SetMaxOpenConns è®¾ç½®æ‰“å¼€æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥çš„æœ€å¤§æ•°é‡ã€‚
sqlDB.SetMaxOpenConns(100)

// SetConnMaxLifetime è®¾ç½®äº†è¿æ¥å¯å¤ç”¨çš„æœ€å¤§æ—¶é—´ã€‚
sqlDB.SetConnMaxLifetime(time.Hour)

æ’å…¥æ•°æ®


//æ·»åŠ æ•°æ®
func add() {
    //æ’å…¥å•æ¡æ•°æ®
    user := User{Model: gorm.Model{}, Name: "wmq", Age: 17}
    result := db.Create(&user)
    fmt.Println(user.ID, result.RowsAffected)
    
    //æ’å…¥æŒ‡å®šå­—æ®µ
    result = db.Select("Name", "Age").Create(&User{Name: "å‰ç«¯å°‘å¹´", Age: 22})
    fmt.Println(user, result.RowsAffected)
    
    //åˆ‡ç‰‡æ‰¹é‡æ’å…¥
    var users = []User{{Name: "w1"}, {Name: "w2"}, {Name: "w3"}}
    result = db.Create(&users)
    fmt.Println("users", result.RowsAffected, users)
    
    //mapæ‰¹é‡æ’å…¥
    db.Model(&User{}).Create(map[string]interface{}{
         "Name": "jinzhu", "Age": 18,
    })
    
    // æ ¹æ® `[]map[string]interface{}{}` æ‰¹é‡æ’å…¥
    db.Model(&User{}).Create([]map[string]interface{}{
        {"Name": "", "Age": nil},
        {"Name": "", "Age": nil},
        {},
    })
}

åˆ›å»ºæ—¶çš„Hookæ“ä½œ

// å¼€å§‹äº‹åŠ¡
BeforeSave
BeforeCreate
// å…³è”å‰çš„ save
// æ’å…¥è®°å½•è‡³ db // å…³è”åçš„ save
AfterCreate AfterSave

æ›´æ–°æ•°æ®

  • ä½¿ç”¨Saveæ–¹æ³• ä¼šä¿å­˜æ‰€æœ‰çš„å­—æ®µï¼Œå³ä½¿å­—æ®µæ˜¯é›¶å€¼

//ä¿®æ”¹
func update() {
	//æ›´æ–°å•åˆ—
	var user User
	user.Name = "è¿å®¢éªšäºº"
	user.Age = 100
	db.Save(&user)
	fmt.Println(user.Name)

	// æ¡ä»¶æ›´æ–°
	db.Model(&User{}).Where("active = ?", true).Update("name", "hello")
	// UPDATE users SET name='hello', updated_at='2013-11-17 21:34:10' WHERE active=true;

	// User çš„ ID æ˜¯ `111`
	db.Model(&user).Update("name", "hello")
	// UPDATE users SET name='hello', updated_at='2013-11-17 21:34:10' WHERE id=111;

	// æ ¹æ®æ¡ä»¶å’Œ model çš„å€¼è¿›è¡Œæ›´æ–°
	db.Model(&user).Where("active = ?", true).Update("name", "hello")
	// UPDATE users SET name='hello', updated_at='2013-11-17 21:34:10' WHERE id=111 AND active=true;

	// æ ¹æ® `struct` æ›´æ–°å±æ€§ï¼Œåªä¼šæ›´æ–°éé›¶å€¼çš„å­—æ®µ
	db.Model(&user).Updates(User{Name: "hello", Age: 18})
	// UPDATE users SET name='hello', age=18, updated_at = '2013-11-17 21:34:10' WHERE id = 111;

	// æ ¹æ® `map` æ›´æ–°å±æ€§
	db.Model(&user).Updates(map[string]interface{}{"Name": "hello", "Age": 18})
	// UPDATE users SET name='hello', age=18, actived=false, updated_at='2013-11-17 21:34:10' WHERE id=111;

	//æ‰¹é‡æ›´æ–°
	// æ ¹æ® struct æ›´æ–°
	db.Model(User{}).Where("role = ?", "admin").Updates(User{Name: "wmq", Age: 18})
	// UPDATE users SET name='hello', age=18 WHERE role = 'admin;

	// æ ¹æ® map æ›´æ–°
	db.Table("users").Where("id IN ?", []int{10, 11}).Updates(map[string]interface{}{"name": "hello", "age": 18})
	// UPDATE users SET name='hello', age=18 WHERE id IN (10, 11);
}

xormçš„ç‰¹æ€§

  • æ”¯æŒStructå’Œæ•°æ®åº“è¡¨ä¹‹é—´çš„çµæ´»æ˜ å°„ï¼Œå¹¶æ”¯æŒè‡ªåŠ¨åŒæ­¥
  • äº‹åŠ¡æ”¯æŒ
  • åŒæ—¶æ”¯æŒåŸå§‹SQLè¯­å¥å’ŒORMæ“ä½œçš„æ··åˆæ‰§è¡Œ
  • ä½¿ç”¨è¿å†™æ¥ç®€åŒ–è°ƒç”¨
  • æ”¯æŒä½¿ç”¨Id, In, Where, Limit, Join, Having, Table, SQL, Colsç­‰å‡½æ•°å’Œç»“æ„ä½“ç­‰æ–¹å¼ä½œä¸ºæ¡ä»¶
  • æ”¯æŒçº§è”åŠ è½½Struct
  • Schemaæ”¯æŒï¼ˆä»…Postgresï¼‰
  • æ”¯æŒç¼“å­˜
  • æ”¯æŒæ ¹æ®æ•°æ®åº“è‡ªåŠ¨ç”Ÿæˆxormçš„ç»“æ„ä½“
  • æ”¯æŒè®°å½•ç‰ˆæœ¬ï¼ˆå³ä¹è§‚é”ï¼‰

åˆ›å»º Engine å¼•æ“ åˆ›å»ºç»“æ„ä½“åŒæ­¥æ•°æ®åº“è¡¨

// CoonXormMysql è¿æ¥æ•°æ®åº“
package main

import (
"fmt"
_ "gorm.io/driver/mysql"
"time"
"xorm.io/xorm"
)

//æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥åŸºæœ¬ä¿¡æ¯
var (
   userName  string = "root"
   password  string = "12138"
   ipAddress string = "127.0.0.1"
   port      int    = 3306
   dbName    string = "xorm_db"
   charset   string = "utf8mb4"
)

type User struct {
   Id      int64
   Name    string
   Age     int
   Passwd  string    `xorm:"varchar(200)"`
   Created time.Time `xorm:"created"`
   Updated time.Time `xorm:"updated"`
}

var engine *xorm.Engine

// CoonXormMysql è¿æ¥æ•°æ®åº“
func CoonXormMysql() {
   //æ„å»ºæ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥ä¿¡æ¯
   dataSourceName := fmt.Sprintf("%s:%s@tcp(%s:%d)/%s?charset=%s", userName, password, ipAddress, port, dbName, charset)
   //åˆ›å»ºå¼•æ“
   engine, _ = xorm.NewEngine("mysql", dataSourceName)

   err := engine.Sync2(new(User))
   if err != nil {
      fmt.Println("åŒæ­¥å¤±è´¥")
   }
}

#CRUDæ“ä½œ
ä½¿ç”¨Engineçš„insertï¼Œqueryï¼Œupdateï¼Œdeleteç­‰æ–¹æ³•

æ·»åŠ 

  • æ’å…¥ä¸€æ¡æ•°æ®ï¼Œæ­¤æ—¶å¯ä»¥ç”¨Insertæˆ–è€…InsertOne 

    user := User{Id: 1, Name: "wmq1", Age: 17, Passwd: "1234567"}
n, _ := engine.Insert(user)

  • æ’å…¥æ•°æ®ä½¿ç”¨Insertæ–¹æ³•ï¼ŒInsertæ–¹æ³•çš„å‚æ•°å¯ä»¥æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªæˆ–å¤šä¸ªStructçš„æŒ‡é’ˆï¼Œä¸€ä¸ªæˆ–å¤šä¸ªStructçš„Sliceçš„æŒ‡é’ˆã€‚
    å¦‚æœä¼ å…¥çš„æ˜¯Sliceå¹¶ä¸”å½“æ•°æ®åº“æ”¯æŒæ‰¹é‡æ’å…¥æ—¶ï¼ŒInsertä¼šä½¿ç”¨æ‰¹é‡æ’å…¥çš„æ–¹å¼è¿›è¡Œæ’å…¥ã€‚

    //useråˆ‡ç‰‡
var users []User
users = append(users, User{Id: 2, Name: "wmq2", Age: 11, Passwd: "12344567"})
users = append(users, User{Id: 3, Name: "wmq3", Age: 10, Passwd: "12344567"})
n, _ = engine.Insert(users)

    è¿™é‡Œè™½ç„¶æ”¯æŒåŒæ—¶æ’å…¥ï¼Œä½†è¿™äº›æ’å…¥å¹¶æ²¡æœ‰äº‹åŠ¡å…³ç³»ã€‚å› æ­¤æœ‰å¯èƒ½åœ¨ä¸­é—´æ’å…¥å‡ºé”™åï¼Œåé¢çš„æ’å…¥å°†ä¸ä¼šç»§ç»­ã€‚æ­¤æ—¶å‰é¢çš„æ’å…¥å·²ç»æˆåŠŸï¼Œå¦‚æœéœ€è¦å›æ»šï¼Œè¯·å¼€å¯äº‹åŠ¡ã€‚
    æ‰¹é‡æ’å…¥ä¼šè‡ªåŠ¨ç”ŸæˆInsert into table values (),(),()çš„è¯­å¥ï¼Œå› æ­¤å„ä¸ªæ•°æ®åº“å¯¹SQLè¯­å¥æœ‰é•¿åº¦é™åˆ¶ï¼Œå› æ­¤è¿™æ ·çš„è¯­å¥æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªæœ€å¤§çš„è®°å½•æ•°ï¼Œæ ¹æ®ç»éªŒæµ‹ç®—åœ¨150æ¡å·¦å³ã€‚å¤§äº150æ¡åï¼Œç”Ÿæˆçš„sqlè¯­å¥å°†å¤ªé•¿å¯èƒ½å¯¼è‡´æ‰§è¡Œå¤±è´¥ã€‚å› æ­¤åœ¨æ’å…¥å¤§é‡æ•°æ®æ—¶ï¼Œç›®å‰éœ€è¦è‡ªè¡Œåˆ†å‰²æˆæ¯150æ¡æ’å…¥ä¸€æ¬¡ã€‚

æŸ¥è¯¢

//æŸ¥è¯¢
func query() {
   //ä½¿ç”¨sqlè¯­å¥æŸ¥è¯¢
   results, _ := engine.Query("select * from user")
   fmt.Println(results)
   results2, _ := engine.QueryString("select * from user")
   fmt.Println(results2)
   results3, _ := engine.QueryInterface("select * from user")
   fmt.Println(results3)

   //Get åªèƒ½æŸ¥è¯¢å•æ¡æ•°æ®
   user := User{}
   engine.Get(&user)
   fmt.Println("æŸ¥è¯¢å•æ¡æ•°æ®", user)

   //æŒ‡å®šæ¡ä»¶æŸ¥è¯¢
   user1 := User{Name: "wmq1"}
   engine.Where("name=?", user1.Name).Asc("id").Get(&user1)
   fmt.Println("æŒ‡å®šæ¡ä»¶æŸ¥è¯¢", user1)

   //è·å–æŒ‡å®šå­—æ®µçš„å€¼
   var name string
   engine.Table(&user).Where("id = 3").Cols("name").Get(&name)
   fmt.Println("è·å–æŒ‡å®šå­—æ®µçš„å€¼", name)

   //æŸ¥è¯¢å¤šæ¡/æ‰€æœ‰è®°å½• find
   var users []User //å®šä¹‰åˆ‡ç‰‡
   engine.Find(&users)
   fmt.Println("æŸ¥è¯¢å¤šæ¡/æ‰€æœ‰è®°å½•", users)

   //Count è·å–è®°å½•æ¡æ•°
   user2 := User{Passwd: "12344567"}
   count, _ := engine.Count(&user2)
   fmt.Println("è·å–è®°å½•æ¡æ•°", count)

   //Iterate å’Œ Rowsæ ¹æ®æ¡ä»¶éå†æ•°æ®
   engine.Iterate(&User{Passwd: "12344567"}, func(idx int, bean interface{}) error {
      user := bean.(*User)
      fmt.Println("Iterate å’Œ Rowsæ ¹æ®æ¡ä»¶éå†æ•°æ®", user)
      return nil
   })
   rows, _ := engine.Rows(&User{Passwd: "12344567"})
   defer rows.Close()
   userBean := new(User)
   for rows.Next() {
      rows.Scan(userBean)
      fmt.Println(userBean)
   }
}

ä¿®æ”¹

//ä¿®æ”¹
func update() {
   //æ›´æ–°
   user := User{Name: "å‰ç«¯å°‘å¹´æ±ª"}
   n, _ := engine.ID(1).Update(&user)
   fmt.Println(n)
}

//åˆ é™¤
func del() {
   //åˆ é™¤
   var user1 User
   n1, _ := engine.ID(3).Delete(&user1)
   fmt.Println(n1)
   
}

package main

import (
   "fmt"
   _ "gorm.io/driver/mysql"
   "time"
   "xorm.io/xorm"
)

//æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥åŸºæœ¬ä¿¡æ¯
var (
   userName  string = "root"
   password  string = "12138"
   ipAddress string = "127.0.0.1"
   port      int    = 3306
   dbName    string = "xorm_db"
   charset   string = "utf8mb4"
)

type User struct {
   Id      int64
   Name    string
   Age     int
   Passwd  string    `xorm:"varchar(200)"`
   Created time.Time `xorm:"created"`
   Updated time.Time `xorm:"updated"`
}

var engine *xorm.Engine

func main() {
   fmt.Println("xorm å­¦ä¹ ")

   CoonXormMysql()
   var input int

   var flag bool = true
   for flag {
      fmt.Println("1.æ·»åŠ ")
      fmt.Println("2.æŸ¥è¯¢")
      fmt.Println("3.æ›´æ–°")
      fmt.Println("4.åˆ é™¤")
      fmt.Println("5.é€€å‡º")
      fmt.Scan(&input)
      if input == 1 {
         add()
      } else if input == 2 {
         query()
      } else if input == 3 {
         update()
      } else if input == 4 {
         del()
      } else if input == 5 {
         flag = false
      }
   }

}

// CoonXormMysql è¿æ¥æ•°æ®åº“
func CoonXormMysql() {
   //æ„å»ºæ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥ä¿¡æ¯
   dataSourceName := fmt.Sprintf("%s:%s@tcp(%s:%d)/%s?charset=%s", userName, password, ipAddress, port, dbName, charset)
   //åˆ›å»ºå¼•æ“
   engine, _ = xorm.NewEngine("mysql", dataSourceName)

   err := engine.Sync2(new(User))
   if err != nil {
      fmt.Println("åŒæ­¥å¤±è´¥")
   }
}

//æ·»åŠ 
func add() {
   user := User{Id: 1, Name: "wmq1", Age: 17, Passwd: "1234567"}
   n, _ := engine.Insert(user)
   fmt.Println(n)
   if n >= 1 {
      fmt.Println("æ’å…¥æˆåŠŸ")
   }

   //useråˆ‡ç‰‡
   var users []User
   users = append(users, User{Id: 2, Name: "wmq2", Age: 11, Passwd: "12344567"})
   users = append(users, User{Id: 3, Name: "wmq3", Age: 10, Passwd: "12344567"})
   n, _ = engine.Insert(users)

}

//æŸ¥è¯¢
func query() {
   //ä½¿ç”¨sqlè¯­å¥æŸ¥è¯¢
   results, _ := engine.Query("select * from user")
   fmt.Println(results)
   results2, _ := engine.QueryString("select * from user")
   fmt.Println(results2)
   results3, _ := engine.QueryInterface("select * from user")
   fmt.Println(results3)

   //Get åªèƒ½æŸ¥è¯¢å•æ¡æ•°æ®
   user := User{}
   engine.Get(&user)
   fmt.Println("æŸ¥è¯¢å•æ¡æ•°æ®", user)

   //æŒ‡å®šæ¡ä»¶æŸ¥è¯¢
   user1 := User{Name: "wmq1"}
   engine.Where("name=?", user1.Name).Asc("id").Get(&user1)
   fmt.Println("æŒ‡å®šæ¡ä»¶æŸ¥è¯¢", user1)

   //è·å–æŒ‡å®šå­—æ®µçš„å€¼
   var name string
   engine.Table(&user).Where("id = 3").Cols("name").Get(&name)
   fmt.Println("è·å–æŒ‡å®šå­—æ®µçš„å€¼", name)

   //æŸ¥è¯¢å¤šæ¡/æ‰€æœ‰è®°å½• find
   var users []User //å®šä¹‰åˆ‡ç‰‡
   engine.Find(&users)
   fmt.Println("æŸ¥è¯¢å¤šæ¡/æ‰€æœ‰è®°å½•", users)

   //Count è·å–è®°å½•æ¡æ•°
   user2 := User{Passwd: "12344567"}
   count, _ := engine.Count(&user2)
   fmt.Println("è·å–è®°å½•æ¡æ•°", count)

   //Iterate å’Œ Rowsæ ¹æ®æ¡ä»¶éå†æ•°æ®
   engine.Iterate(&User{Passwd: "12344567"}, func(idx int, bean interface{}) error {
      user := bean.(*User)
      fmt.Println("Iterate å’Œ Rowsæ ¹æ®æ¡ä»¶éå†æ•°æ®", user)
      return nil
   })
   rows, _ := engine.Rows(&User{Passwd: "12344567"})
   defer rows.Close()
   userBean := new(User)
   for rows.Next() {
      rows.Scan(userBean)
      fmt.Println(userBean)
   }
}

//ä¿®æ”¹
func update() {
   //æ›´æ–°
   user := User{Name: "å‰ç«¯å°‘å¹´æ±ª"}
   n, _ := engine.ID(1).Update(&user)
   fmt.Println(n)
}

//åˆ é™¤
func del() {
   //åˆ é™¤
   var user1 User
   n1, _ := engine.ID(3).Delete(&user1)
   fmt.Println(n1)
}

ä»¥ä¸Šå°±æ˜¯goä½¿ç”¨gormæˆ–è€…xormçš„ä¸€ä¸ªæœ€ç®€å•çš„crudçš„åŸºæœ¬æ“ä½œäº†ï¼Œå½“ç„¶gormå’Œxormçš„åŠŸèƒ½è¿œä¸æ­¢å¦‚æ­¤ï¼Œæ›´å¤šçš„ç‰¹æ€§å’ŒåŠŸèƒ½å¯ä»¥åœ¨å¼€å‘è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­æŸ¥é˜…å…¶å®˜ç½‘å³å¯

gorm å’Œ xorm çš„åŒºåˆ«

gorm å’Œ xorm éƒ½æ˜¯ Go è¯­è¨€ä¸­å¸¸ç”¨çš„ ORMï¼ˆå¯¹è±¡å…³ç³»æ˜ å°„ï¼‰æ¡†æ¶ã€‚ä¸‹é¢æ˜¯å®ƒä»¬çš„ä¸»è¦åŒºåˆ«ï¼š

  1. è®¾è®¡å“²å­¦ä¸åŒï¼šgorm è®¾è®¡æ€ç»´æ›´åŠ ä¸¥è°¨ã€è§„èŒƒåŒ–ï¼Œæ›´åŠ æ³¨é‡ç¬¦åˆ SQL æ ‡å‡†ï¼›xorm è®¾è®¡æ€ç»´æ›´åŠ çµæ´»ï¼Œå…è®¸ç”¨æˆ·é€šè¿‡æŒ‡å®šæ ‡ç­¾è½»æ¾æ˜ å°„ structï¼Œæä¾›äº†æ›´å¤šé’ˆå¯¹ NoSQL æ•°æ®åº“çš„æ”¯æŒã€‚

  2. æ€§èƒ½è¡¨ç°ä¸åŒï¼šæ ¹æ®å„è‡ªçš„ benchmark ç»“æœï¼Œxorm çš„æ€§èƒ½é€šå¸¸æ¯” gorm æ›´é«˜ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸” xorm å¯¹äºè¿æ¥æ± çš„å¤„ç†ä¹Ÿæ›´ä¼˜ç§€ã€‚
